languages.text: "Хватит с меня законников — отправь псину маршалу, и пусть Арбитес больше не докучают мне своими проблемами".
"I have had enough of lawmen. Send the cur to the Marshal. And from now on, I do not want to hear from any Arbitrators coming to me with their problems."
languages.original_text: "Хватит с меня законников — отправь псину маршалу, и пусть Арбитес больше не докучают мне своими проблемами".

traits.locale_text: "I have had enough of lawmen. Send the cur to the Marshal, and from now on, no more Arbites coming to me with their tedious problems."
"I have had enough of lawmen. Send the cur to the Marshal, and from now on, no more Arbites coming to me with their tedious problems."
"I have had enough of lawmen. Send the cur to the Marshal. And from now on, I do not want to hear from Arbites coming to me with their tedious problems."
"I have had enough of lawmen. Send the cur to the Marshal. And from now on, I do not want to hear from Arbites coming to me with their tedious problems."
"I have had enough of lawmen. Send the cur to the Marshal. And from now on, I do not want to hear from any Arbitrators coming to me with their problems."
"I have had enough of lawmen. Send the cur to the Marshal. And from now on, I do not want to hear from any Arbitrators coming to me with their problems."

languages.text: 「法執行官にはもううんざりだ。あの野良犬を将帥のもとへ送り返せ。アービトレイターが自分の問題を持ち込んでくるのは、もうごめんだ」
languages.original_text: "I have had enough of lawmen. Send the cur to the Marshal. And from now on, I do not want to hear from any Arbitrators coming to me with their problems."

traits.locale_text: 「法執行官にはもううんざりだ。あの野良犬を将帥のもとへ送り返せ。アービトレイターが自分の問題を持ち込んでくるのは、もうごめんだ」

languages.text: "Kanuncularla daha işim olmaz. İti Miralay'a gönderin. Bundan böyle Yargıcıların sorunlarını dinlemek istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "I have had enough of lawmen. Send the cur to the Marshal. And from now on, I do not want to hear from any Arbitrators coming to me with their problems."

traits.locale_text: "Kanun adamlarıyla işim buraya kadar. İti Miralay'a gönderin. Bundan böyle Yargıcıların sorunlarını dinlemek istemiyorum."

languages.text: «Me he cansado de agentes de la ley. Envíen a ese perro con el Mariscal. Y, de ahora en adelante, no quiero que vengan más Arbitrator con sus problemas».
languages.original_text: "I have had enough of lawmen. Send the cur to the Marshal. And from now on, I do not want to hear from any Arbitrators coming to me with their problems."

traits.locale_text: «Me he cansado de agentes de la ley. Envíen a ese perro con el Mariscal. Y, de ahora en adelante, no quiero que vengan más Arbitrator con sus problemas».

languages.text: “我已经受够那些法务官了。把那条狗送到元帅那里去，从今往后，无论那些法务官遇到了什么问题，我都不想再管了。”
languages.original_text: "I have had enough of lawmen. Send the cur to the Marshal. And from now on, I do not want to hear from any Arbitrators coming to me with their problems."

traits.locale_text: “我已经受够那些法务官了。把那条狗送到元帅那里去，从今往后，无论那些法务官遇到了什么问题，我都不想再管了。”

languages.text: « J'en ai plus qu'assez des représentants de l'ordre. Envoyez son sale cabot au maréchal. Et à compter de ce jour, je ne veux plus jamais entendre parler des arbitrators et de leurs petits problèmes. »
languages.original_text: "I have had enough of lawmen. Send the cur to the Marshal. And from now on, I do not want to hear from any Arbitrators coming to me with their problems."

traits.locale_text: « J'en ai plus qu'assez des représentants de l'ordre. Envoyez son sale cabot au maréchal. Et à compter de ce jour, je ne veux plus jamais entendre parler des arbitrators et de leurs petits problèmes. »

languages.text: "Verschont mich mit diesen Gesetzeshütern. Schickt den Mistkerl zum Marschall. Und ab jetzt will ich keine Arbitratoren mehr sehen, die mit ihren Problemen zu mir kommen."
languages.original_text: "I have had enough of lawmen. Send the cur to the Marshal. And from now on, I do not want to hear from any Arbitrators coming to me with their problems."

traits.locale_text: "Verschont mich mit diesen Gesetzeshütern. Schickt den Mistkerl zum Marschall. Und ab jetzt will ich keine Arbitratoren mehr sehen, die mit ihren Problemen zu mir kommen."
